course_description: Pre-requisites: BIOS 500, EPI 530, and EPI 534 or EPI 533 (concurrent ok). This course is designed for students outside of the Department of Epidemiology, and further develops epidemiologic concepts introduced in Epidemiologic Methods I. The course presents a more advanced discussion of issues related to bias, study design, and interaction. It also includes an introduction to logistic regression for epidemiologic analyses.
